meta.title: From SORRY to BABY
meta.author: Natan Last
meta.author_bio: Natan Last is the author of [Across the Universe: The Past, Present, and Future of the Crossword Puzzle](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/723796/across-the-universe-by-natan-last/). He works in humanitarian immigration and has written crosswords, essays, and poems for The New Yorker, The New York Times, The Atlantic, and elsewhere.
meta.message: Today's Raddle is by Natan Last. Natan writes, "[_Sorry, Baby_](https://a24films.com/films/sorry-baby) is one of the best movies of 2025—dark, literary, funny, precise. And a great winter movie besides."
